about_the_game:
THE BEST INVESTOR is a board game in which your adventure begins with 5 million dollars, then face your opponents by making investments of all kinds in order to increase this financial wealth as much as possible in order to become the best investor in the game!
Give the best of yourself by developing your own investment strategies and comparing them with the strategies of your opponents, however be careful of bad decisions because these can lead you to elimination and being out of the ranking and that doesn't matter your financial wealth!
This game also aims to reproduce as close to reality as possible many situations that one may encounter when managing a financial portfolio! In addition to improving your geographic knowledge through the discovery of numerous cities, THE BEST INVESTOR is an excellent, fun and entertaining way to approach financial education!
You can play with up to 6 people on the same screen or play alone against the robots.



Choose from a multitude of shares in each city and invest according to your strategy, receive dividends from these shares every minute and generate passive income!
You can resell your stock shares at the stock market price whenever you want!

You will also be able to buy and resell gold, so as to benefit or not depending on your decisions on this market combined with that of stock market shares!

You will be able to recover your profits after passing a TAXES box where you will pay taxes on your profits, the Taxes and start boxes are the only boxes where it is impossible to make an action, you can only recover in your profits. For the other squares on the board you will be entitled to 2 actions per turn.
Your profits may be stored in one or more bank accounts depending on your investment strategy, however be careful because these banks can go bankrupt!
You will be able to transfer money from one bank account to another!

You will also be able to sell the cities you hold and their respective investments to other players and therefore buy the cities held by other players who have put them up for sale!

In short, there are a lot of possibilities available to you, it's up to you to make good use of them in order to build a solid investment strategy capable of challenging and beating your opponents to become THE BEST INVESTOR.
